ConvertorStringToBool

This component converts a string input to a Boolean output when triggered by the input event. If the input is "0" or "EHS_FALSE" the output will be "FALSE", otherwise the output will be "TRUE".

Ports

  • [In] :

    Data input, value of the data to be converted.

  • [Out] :

    Data output.

  • [In] :

    Event input, triggers the conversion of the input data [In] to output [Out].

  • [Out] :

    Event output.

Parameters

None.

State Machine

Stateless.

Profiles

All.

Toolbox

Core.

Version

v2.1.

Native Dependencies

  • TDK1.1:

Licence Type

LGPL.

Component Supplier

inx ltd.
